thread.title: TRANSFER DEADLINE DAY LIVE: See who makes the last minute moves before 11pm
thread.title_full: TRANSFER DEADLINE DAY LIVE: See who makes the last minute moves before 11pm

title: TRANSFER DEADLINE DAY LIVE: See who makes the last minute moves before 11pm
text: TRANSFER DEADLINE DAY LIVE: See who makes the last minute moves before 11pm EXPRESS SPORT brings you all the latest transfer news on Deadline Day. PUBLISHED: 06:30, Tue, Jan 31, 2017 | UPDATED: 06:37, Tue, Jan 31, 2017 The transfer window shuts at 11pm in England Clubs will face a race against time to get the paperwork done before the deadline Follow all the action here with Express Sport
